item.title: Used TDD Approach for a Hello World Rust CLI App
item.description: For the first time ever in my life i wrote hello world application using TDD (Test driven development). Don’t get me wrong here, i have practiced TDD before for larger applications but never have i done it for an hello world app. Problem Write an CLI application that prints out “Hello TDD world!” in STDOUT. How did i do it? I created a project using cargo new hello-tdd-world I added a dependency assert_cmd which lets us test out outputs of any binary program Created a file tests/cli.
